resources.string: \t\t1. Sha hiihii la Aondo gba sha man tar, tar yo gba lun daang gbilin tso Sha hiihii la Aondo gba sha man tar, tar yo gba lun daang gbilin tso
Your recent searches will appear here!
Ter Aondo A lu a ven dedoo Ter Aondo A lu a ven dedoo Ter Aondo A lu a ven dedoo Ter Aondo A lu a ven dedoo Ter Aondo A lu a ven dedoo
Your highlighted verses will appear here!
Your saved bookmarks will appear here!
Your verses notes will appear here!

Ter wase u A lu sha, i tsegha iti You, tartor wou va, i er ishima you shin tar kpaa vough er i eren i sha nahan. Na se kwaghyan wase nyian u a lu sha ciu ayange ayange la; man de se de anzo ase di er se kpaa se deen mba ve gbe anzo hen vese nahan; man shi de ze a vese ape imeen ilu ga, kpa yima se sha ifer.Gadia tartor ka u wou kua agee man icivir kpaa, gbem sha won, Amen.

The Tiv Bible Mobile App is a robust, user friendly, FREE and offline app that allows you to read the Holy Bible in Tiv language. It has awesome, cool features such as:
1. Copy/Paste of multiple verses 2. Bookmarking multiple verses for later references. 3. Highlighting verses using different highlight colors for emphasis. 4. Changing font size and style dynamically while reading the bible. 5. Dynamic switching between Light, Dark, System Default and Battery Saver Modes respectively. 6. So much more to name a few!!!
Please download and enjoy the app using the link below:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.iniongun.tivbible&hl=en
Oh! Don\'t forget to give the app a good rating on the Playstore!
